rules_text:
Deception {1}{B}{B}{B} [i]({1}{B}{B}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Butcher of the Three Paths deals combat damage to a player, exile the top five cards of their library. You may cast a card exiled this way without paying its mana cost.
